name: Knowledge Boy
description:
This is a game about a boy who never stops learning. If he stops he will face consequences. He is also constantly attacked by people (zombies) who had stopped learning. 

Controls:

W - Jump

A, D - Run

How to play:

If you get hit twice by a zombie you are gonna freeze and be revived at the start of the game. Don't worry, you can't die, you can just respawn.  Also if you stop for too long you'll respawn. Collect all of the books to win!
